about_the_game:
Pick up a Bronze Starter Pack to upgrade, enhance, and advance in EVE Online. Start out with key items and access to the full EVE experience. Explore the possibilities, train, specialize, customize your character, and more.

Includes:

  • 14 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships. Get 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.
  • 50,000 Skill Points - Invest and specialise your pilot.
  • Five stellar ship SKINs - Dominate New Eden and look great doing it!
  • Specialist 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 8 days (or 16 days with the Biology 5 skill).
  • 2 x Core Ship Operations Expert System - Enjoy 14 days access to EVE’s core skills.

Single purchase per account.
detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Pick up a Bronze Starter Pack to upgrade, enhance, and advance in EVE Online. Start out with key items and access to the full EVE experience. Explore the possibilities, train, specialize, customize your character, and more.

Includes:

  • 14 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships. Get 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.
  • 50,000 Skill Points - Invest and specialise your pilot.
  • Five stellar ship SKINs - Dominate New Eden and look great doing it!
  • Specialist 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 8 days (or 16 days with the Biology 5 skill).
  • 2 x Core Ship Operations Expert System - Enjoy 14 days access to EVE’s core skills.

Single purchase per account.
name: EVE Online: Bronze Starter pack

package_groups.name: default

package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Bronze Starter pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster
